title: I got put in a low priority queue for 5 games.
body: I didn't play in a long time and then I go back on and it says I played right before April which is bullshit because my computer was broke at that time. I got a new one, decided to play one of my favorite games, and I have to wait 20 minutes.

replies.body:
It sounds like someone may have been on your account and racked up some Leaverbuster or dodging low-priority queues. As a first step, I'd recommend [securing your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to ensure nobody else can access it.

As for the low-priority queue, it's unfortunately not something that we can remove, so you'll need to play through the queues until you've finished them all. This system was automated to prevent any sort of abuse of the system occurring.

Let me know if you have any questions.
